scripts.text: SELECT distinct t.year,t.month from silver.vw_trip_data_green t

CREATE view gold.vw_trip_data_green
as 
SELECT
    result.filepath(1) as year,
    result.filepath(2) as month, 
    result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
    BULK  'gold/trip_data_green/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src',  
    FORMAT = 'parquet'
    ) 
    with 
    (
       trip_date DATE,Borough VARCHAR(25),trip_day VARCHAR(25),trip_day_weekend_ind VARCHAR(1),
       card_trip_count INT,cash_trip_count INT
    )
    AS [result]
SELECT distinct t.year,t.month from bronze.vw_trip_data_green_csv t

CREATE view silver.vw_trip_data_green
as 
SELECT
    result.filepath(1) as year,
    result.filepath(2) as month, 
    result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
    BULK  'silver/trip_data_green/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src',  
    FORMAT = 'parquet'
    ) 
    with 
    (
        VendorID INT,lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),RatecodeID INT,PULocationID SMALLINT,DOLocationID SMALLINT,
    passenger_count INT,trip_distance FLOAT,fare_amount FLOAT,extra FLOAT ,mta_tax Float,
    tip_amount Float,tolls_amount Float,ehail_fee Float,improvement_surcharge Float,total_amount Float,
    payment_type SMALLINT,trip_type SMALLINT,congestion_surcharge Float
    )
    AS [result]

content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery

 SELECT
    top 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )  AS [result]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
with v_trip_data as (
select * from 
 OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )  AS trip_data

),
v_taxi_zone as (
select * from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    WITH (LocationID SMALLINT,Borough VARCHAR(255),Zone VARCHAR(255),service_zone VARCHAR(255)) as taxi_zone

),
v_payment_type as (
select * from
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b', 
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    ) 
    with (jsondoc NVARCHAR(MAX)) AS [result] 
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsondoc)
    with (payment_type TINYINT,derscription VARCHAR(25) '$.payment_type_desc') as payment_type_tab
)

select v_taxi_zone.Borough,
        count(1) as total_trips,
        sum(case when v_payment_type.derscription='Cash' then 1 else 0 end) as Cash_trip,
        sum(case when v_payment_type.derscription='Credit card' then 1 else 0 end) as Credit_trip
from v_trip_data join v_taxi_zone 
    on v_trip_data.PULocationID=v_taxi_zone.LocationID
join v_payment_type
   on v_payment_type.payment_type=v_trip_data.payment_type
    where v_payment_type.payment_type in (1,2)
    group by v_taxi_zone.Borough

USE Master
GO

--select * from bronze.vw_trip_data_green_csv where year='''+@year+''' and month='''+@month+'''';
CREATE or ALTER procedure gold.usp_gold_trip_data_green
@year VARCHAR(4),@month varchar(2)
AS
BEGIN
DECLARE @create_sql NVARCHAR(MAX),
@drop_sql NVARCHAR(MAX);

set @create_sql='CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.trip_data_green_'+@year+'_'+@month+
 ' WITH (
    LOCATION = ''gold/trip_data_green/year='+@year+'/month='+@month+''',
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,  
    FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
 
)
as 
select td.year,td.month,convert(DATE,td.lpep_pickup_datetime) as trip_date,tz.Borough,cal.day_name as trip_day,
case when cal.day_name in (''Saturday'',''Sunday'') then ''Y'' else ''N'' end as trip_day_weekend_ind ,
sum(case when pt.derscription=''Credit card'' then 1 else 0 end) as card_trip_count,
sum(case when pt.derscription=''Cash'' then 1 else 0 end) as cash_trip_count
from silver.vw_trip_data_green td 
join silver.taxi_zone tz on tz.LocationID=td.PULocationID
join silver.calendar cal on cal.date=convert(DATE,td.lpep_pickup_datetime)
join silver.payment_type pt on pt.payment_type=td.payment_type
WHERE td.year='''+@year+''' AND td.month=''' + @month +'''
group by td.year,td.month,convert(DATE,td.lpep_pickup_datetime),tz.Borough,cal.day_name ,
case when cal.day_name in (''Saturday'',''Sunday'') then ''Y'' else ''N'' end'

EXEC sp_executesql @create_sql;

print(@create_sql)

set @drop_sql='drop EXTERNAL TABLE gold.trip_data_green_'+@year+'_'+@month;

EXEC sp_executesql @drop_sql;
END;

USE nyc_taxi_ldw
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (select * from sys.external_file_formats where name ='csv_file_format')
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format
WITH (
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
        FORMAT_OPTIONS(
            FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
            STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
            FIRST_ROW=2,
            USE_TYPE_DEFAULT=FALSE,
            ENCODING='UTF8',
            PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
        )
    );
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (select * from sys.external_file_formats where name ='csv_file_format_pv1')
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format_pv1
WITH (
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
        FORMAT_OPTIONS(
            FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
            STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
            FIRST_ROW=2,
            USE_TYPE_DEFAULT=FALSE,
            ENCODING='UTF8',
            PARSER_VERSION='1.0'
        )
    );
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (select * from sys.external_file_formats where name ='tsv_file_format')
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT tsv_file_format
WITH (
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
        FORMAT_OPTIONS(
            FIELD_TERMINATOR = '\t',
            STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
            FIRST_ROW=2,
            USE_TYPE_DEFAULT=FALSE,
            ENCODING='UTF8',
            PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
        )
    );
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (select * from sys.external_file_formats where name ='parquet_file_format')
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT parquet_file_format
WITH
(  
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
)
 
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (select * from sys.external_file_formats where name ='delta_file_format')
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT delta_file_format
WITH
(  
    FORMAT_TYPE = delta,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
    
)
 
GO

CREATE or ALTER procedure silver.usp_silver_taxi_zone
AS
BEGIN
--silver.taxi_zone
IF object_id('silver.taxi_zone') is not NULL
    drop EXTERNAL TABLE silver.taxi_zone

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.taxi_zone
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'silver/taxi_zone',
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,  
    FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
 
)
as 
select * from bronze.taxi_zone

END
GO

USE nyc_taxi_ldw
GO

-- create taxi_zone
IF object_id('bronze.taxi_zone') is not NULL
    drop EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.taxi_zone

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.taxi_zone
(
    LocationID SMALLINT,Borough VARCHAR(15),Zone VARCHAR(50),service_zone VARCHAR(15)
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,  
    FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format,
    REJECT_VALUE=10,
    REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION='rejection/taxi_zone'
)
GO

-- create calendar
IF object_id('bronze.calendar') is not NULL
    drop EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.taxi_zone

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.calendar
(
    date_key INT,date DATE,year SMALLINT,month SMALLINT,day SMALLINT,
        day_name varchar(20),day_of_year SMALLINT,week_of_month SMALLINT,
        week_of_year SMALLINT,month_name VARCHAR(15),year_month INT,year_week INT
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'raw/calendar.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,  
    FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format
)
GO

--create vendor
IF object_id('bronze.vendor') is not NULL
    drop EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.vendor

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.vendor
(
    vendor_id SMALLINT,vendor_name VARCHAR(50)
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'raw/vendor.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,  
    FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_pv1
)
GO
--create trip_type
IF object_id('bronze.trip_type') is not NULL
    drop EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_type

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_type
(
    trip_type INT,trip_type_desc VARCHAR(15)
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'raw/trip_type.tsv',
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,  
    FILE_FORMAT = tsv_file_format
)
GO
--create trip_data_green_csv
IF object_id('bronze.trip_data_green_csv') is not NULL
    drop EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_csv

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_csv
(
    VendorID INT,lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),RatecodeID INT,PULocationID SMALLINT,DOLocationID SMALLINT,
    passenger_count INT,trip_distance FLOAT,fare_amount FLOAT,extra FLOAT ,mta_tax Float,
    tip_amount Float,tolls_amount Float,ehail_fee Float,improvement_surcharge Float,total_amount Float,
    payment_type SMALLINT,trip_type SMALLINT,congestion_surcharge Float
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,  
    FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format
)
GO

--create trip_data_green_parquet
IF object_id('bronze.trip_data_green_parquet') is not NULL
    drop EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_parquet

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_parquet
(
    VendorID INT,lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),RatecodeID INT,PULocationID SMALLINT,DOLocationID SMALLINT,
    passenger_count INT,trip_distance FLOAT,fare_amount FLOAT,extra FLOAT ,mta_tax Float,
    tip_amount Float,tolls_amount Float,ehail_fee INT,improvement_surcharge Float,total_amount Float,
    payment_type SMALLINT,trip_type SMALLINT,congestion_surcharge Float
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'raw/trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,  
    FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
)
GO

select top 10 * from bronze.trip_data_green_parquet

--create trip_data_green_delta
IF object_id('bronze.trip_data_green_delta') is not NULL
    drop EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_delta

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_delta
(
    VendorID INT,lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),RatecodeID INT,PULocationID SMALLINT,DOLocationID SMALLINT,
    passenger_count INT,trip_distance FLOAT,fare_amount FLOAT,extra FLOAT ,mta_tax Float,
    tip_amount Float,tolls_amount Float,ehail_fee INT,improvement_surcharge Float,total_amount Float,
    payment_type SMALLINT,trip_type SMALLINT,congestion_surcharge Float
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'raw/trip_data_green_delta/',
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,  
    FILE_FORMAT = delta_file_format
)
GO

select top 10 * from bronze.trip_data_green_delta

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--- Reading Data from JSON file with line formate

---{"payment_type":1,"payment_type_desc":"Credit card"}
---{"payment_type":2,"payment_type_desc":"Cash"}
---{"payment_type":3,"payment_type_desc":"No charge"}
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
select payment_type,derscription
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b', 
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    ) 
    with (jsondoc NVARCHAR(MAX)) AS [result] 
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsondoc)
    with (payment_type TINYINT,derscription VARCHAR(25) '$.payment_type_desc');

USE nyc_taxi_ldw
GO

DROP VIEW if EXISTS bronze.vw_rate_code
GO

CREATE view bronze.vw_rate_code 
as 
select rate_code_id,rate_code
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/raw/rate_code.json',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_src',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b', 
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR='0x0b'
    ) 
    with (jsondoc NVARCHAR(MAX)) AS [result] 
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsondoc)
    with (rate_code_id TINYINT,rate_code VARCHAR(25) )
Go

    with (payment_type TINYINT,derscription VARCHAR(25) '$.payment_type_desc')

DROP VIEW if EXISTS bronze.vw_trip_data_green_csv
GO

CREATE view bronze.vw_trip_data_green_csv 
as 
SELECT
    result.filepath(1) as year,
    result.filepath(2) as month, 
    result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv' ,
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_src',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    with 
    (
        VendorID INT,lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),RatecodeID INT,PULocationID SMALLINT,DOLocationID SMALLINT,
    passenger_count INT,trip_distance FLOAT,fare_amount FLOAT,extra FLOAT ,mta_tax Float,
    tip_amount Float,tolls_amount Float,ehail_fee Float,improvement_surcharge Float,total_amount Float,
    payment_type SMALLINT,trip_type SMALLINT,congestion_surcharge Float
    )
    AS [result]
GO 

select count(1)  from bronze.vw_trip_data_green_csv
where year='2020' and month='02'

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--- Reading Data from JSON file with Array Formate

---{"payment_type":4,"payment_type_desc":[{"sub_type":1, "value":"Dispute"}]}
---{"payment_type":5,"payment_type_desc":[{"sub_type":1, "value":"Unknown"}, {"sub_type":2, "value":"Unavailable"}]}
---{"payment_type":6,"payment_type_desc":[{"sub_type":1, "value":"Voided trip"}]}
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------    
--Reading Data from JSON file with Array Formate using open json

select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b', 
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    ) 
    with (jsondoc NVARCHAR(MAX)) AS [result] 
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsondoc)
    with (payment_type TINYINT,payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(MAX) as JSON )
     CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(payment_type_desc)
     WITH (Description VARCHAR(25) '$.value');

DROP VIEW if EXISTS silver.vw_trip_data_green
GO

CREATE view silver.vw_trip_data_green
as 
SELECT
    result.filepath(1) as year,
    result.filepath(2) as month, 
    result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
    BULK  'silver/trip_data_green/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src',  
    FORMAT = 'parquet'
    ) 
    with 
    (
        VendorID INT,lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),RatecodeID INT,PULocationID SMALLINT,DOLocationID SMALLINT,
    passenger_count INT,trip_distance FLOAT,fare_amount FLOAT,extra FLOAT ,mta_tax Float,
    tip_amount Float,tolls_amount Float,ehail_fee Float,improvement_surcharge Float,total_amount Float,
    payment_type SMALLINT,trip_type SMALLINT,congestion_surcharge Float
    )
    AS [result]

        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',

FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv' ,
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',

        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    AS [result]
    group by result.filename(),result.filepath() 
    order by 1

SELECT
    result.filepath(1) as year,
    result.filepath(2) as month, 
    count(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv' ,
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    AS [result]
    group by result.filepath(1),result.filepath(2)
    order by 1 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
    SELECT
    result.filepath(1) as year,
    result.filepath(2) as month, 
    count(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv' ,
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    AS [result]
    where result.filepath(1)=2020 and result.filepath(2) in ('06','07','08')
    group by result.filepath(1),result.filepath(2)
    order by 1 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

use nyc_taxi_ldw
GO

select td.year,td.month,convert(DATE,td.lpep_pickup_datetime) as trip_date,tz.Borough,cal.day_name as trip_day,
case when cal.day_name in ('Saturday','Sunday') then 'Y' else 'N' end as trip_day_weekend_ind ,
sum(case when pt.derscription='Credit card' then 1 else 0 end) as card_trip_count,
sum(case when pt.derscription='Cash' then 1 else 0 end) as cash_trip_count
from silver.vw_trip_data_green td 
join silver.taxi_zone tz on tz.LocationID=td.PULocationID
join silver.calendar cal on cal.date=convert(DATE,td.lpep_pickup_datetime)
join silver.payment_type pt on pt.payment_type=td.payment_type
WHERE td.year='2020' AND td.month='01'
group by td.year,td.month,convert(DATE,td.lpep_pickup_datetime),tz.Borough,cal.day_name ,
case when cal.day_name in ('Saturday','Sunday') then 'Y' else 'N' end

source:
## Trip Data Aggregation 
### Group By Columns
1. year
2. Month
3. Pickup Location ID
4. Drop Off Location ID

### Aggregated Columns
1. Total Trip Count
2. Total Fare Amount

### Purpose of the notebook

Demonstrate the integration between Spark Pool and Serverless SQL Pool

1. Create the aggregated table in Spark Pool
2. Access the data from Serverless SQL Pool

#Set the folder paths so that it can be used later. 
bronze_folder_path = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapseadlk.dfs.core.windows.net/raw'
silver_folder_path = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapseadlk.dfs.core.windows.net/silver'
gold_folder_path = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapseadlk.dfs.core.windows.net/gold'
#Set the spark config to be able to get the partitioned columns year and month as strings rather than integers

%%sql

-- Create database to which we are going to write the data

CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS nyc_taxi_ldw_spark
LOCATION 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapseadlk.dfs.core.windows.net/gold';
# Read the silver data to be processed.

# Perform the required aggregations
# 1. Total trip count
# 2. Total fare amount
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

trip_data_green_agg_df = trip_data_green_df \
                        .groupBy("year", "month", "PULocationID", "DOLocationID") \
                        .agg(count(lit(1)).alias("total_trip_count"),
                        round(sum("fare_amount"), 2).alias("total_fare_amount"))

# Write the aggregated data to the gold table for consumption

trip_data_green_agg_df.write.mode("overwrite").partitionBy("year", "month").format("parquet").saveAsTable("nyc_taxi_ldw_spark.trip_data_green_agg")
